query:
ALTER TABLE timeEntries 
ADD COLUMN userId INT NOT NULL AFTER id,
ADD COLUMN title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER clientId,
ADD COLUMN date DATE NOT NULL AFTER description,
ADD COLUMN period ENUM('morning', 'afternoon', 'evening') NOT NULL AFTER date,
ADD COLUMN type ENUM('billable', 'non_billable') NOT NULL AFTER period,
ADD COLUMN status ENUM('planned', 'in_progress', 'completed') DEFAULT 'planned' AFTER hourlyRate,
MODIFY COLUMN startTime TIMESTAMP NULL,
DROP COLUMN isBillable;
